welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Old Jamestown, a charming city known for its rich history and stunning architecture. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Spirit Of St Louis Airport, where all commercial flights are operated.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated for private and chartered flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: East Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic flights for Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic flights for American Airlines, Delta Air Lines, and United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Alton Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Alton Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St. Louis Downtown Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For private and charter flights, the private terminal at St. Louis Downtown Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Belleville Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Belleville Airport handles all freight and package shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
